channel.title: Apple Watch on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Apple Watch on My New Hugo Site

item.title: You probably don't understand watches
item.description: [whitebox] [big]Today in Tedium: If someone shows you a $10,000 watch, do you understand its inherent value, or do you roll your eyes? Do you think it looks ugly? Do you think that watches that cost a quarter of the average American’s salary make any sense whatsoever? Do you see them as an opportunity to play up the class wars a little more? Or are you a techie thinking about watches in terms of that awesome laptop with the USB-C port?
